elements.name: question1
rows: I mark the e-mails that have not yet been answered.
I reply to e-mails within three days.
I make sure I use a suitable form of address and greeting.
I thank you for the e-mail in a reply.
I check whether names, dates, times etc. are correct.
I check spelling, punctuation and grammar.
I avoid subjunctives such as would, would have, could, would be, etc.
elements.title: 4 = always | 3 = most of the time | 2 = rarely | 1 = never

elements.name: question2
rows: I make sure my tone is friendly and constructive.
I read through the text again before sending it.
If I am unsure, I have my texts checked.
I write a meaningful subject line.
I check whether I have inserted all the attachments.
I check the recipient addresses before sending.
I archive important e-mails in a filing system.
elements.title: 4 = always | 3 = most of the time | 2 = rarely | 1 = never
